title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 14 July 2008 - XWiki
content:
Tuxide|laptop - (14/07/2008 09:25): Anyone familiar with XWikiSql plugin know how to retrieve a blob from a database?  
continuum - (14/07/2008 09:39): BUILD FAILURE: XWiki Products - Enterprise - Functional XMLRPC Tests http://continuum.xwiki.org/continuum/buildResult.action?buildId=33164&projectId=257  
continuum - (14/07/2008 09:40): BUILD FAILURE: XWiki Products - Enterprise - LDAP Functional Tests http://continuum.xwiki.org/continuum/buildResult.action?buildId=33165&projectId=259  
Tuxide|laptop - (14/07/2008 10:46): Anyone familiar with XWikiSql plugin know how to retrieve a LONGVARBINARY from a database?  
risherry - (14/07/2008 15:07): hi :) did anyone seen sdumitriu? :)   
risherry - (14/07/2008 15:08): aaa... and Happy Birthday for french guys :P   
Tuxide - (14/07/2008 21:45): Anyone familiar with XWikiSql plugin know how to retrieve a LONGVARBINARY (Blob) from a database?
